title: Diplome course in MERN Stack Development
description: Master MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js to build full-stack web apps with real projects.
longDescription: Dive deep into the world of full-stack development with the powerful MERN stack. This course equips you with practical skills through real-world projects, covering best practices, architecture patterns, and deployment workflows. Perfect for intermediate learners looking to build production-grade applications.

curriculum.title: Module 1: Web & Programming Fundamentals
lectures: Internet, browsers, servers — how the web works
Intro to version control with Git & GitHub

curriculum.title: Module 7: Integrating MERN
lectures: Connecting React frontend with Express backend

curriculum.title: Module 8: Deployment & DevOps Basics
lectures: Using MongoDB Atlas for live DB

curriculum.title: Module 9: Capstone Project & Portfolio
lectures: Build a complete MERN CRUD app with auth (e.g., Task Manager or Blog)
Best practices: code structure, linting, readme

faqs.q: What is the MERN Stack and why should I learn it?
faqs.a: The MERN Stack is a popular set of JavaScript technologies — MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js — used to build modern, full-stack web applications. It’s in high demand because you can develop both frontend and backend using just one language: JavaScript!

faqs.q: Do I need any coding experience to join this course?
faqs.a: Basic computer and internet knowledge is enough. We start from the fundamentals and cover everything step-by-step. Prior knowledge of HTML, CSS, or JavaScript is helpful but not mandatory.

faqs.q: Will I get a certificate and project portfolio after completion?
faqs.a: Yes! You’ll receive an official Oplyx Diploma Certificate and have a GitHub portfolio with real projects that you can showcase to employers or clients.

faqs.q: Is there any placement or internship support?
faqs.a: Absolutely! Top-performing students will get internship opportunities at Oplyx or partner companies. We also guide you on building your CV, LinkedIn profile, and preparing for developer interviews.

title: Diploma Course in Graphics Design
description: Learn modern graphic design: typography, color theory, layout & branding using real tools.
longDescription: Unlock your creativity and master visual communication with our comprehensive graphics design course. Covering design principles, branding, and hands-on tools like Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop, this program prepares you to craft stunning visuals for real brands.

curriculum.title: Module 1: Introduction to Graphic Design
lectures: Types of Design: Print, Digital, Branding
Design Principles: Balance, Contrast, Hierarchy, Alignment, Proximity
File Types & Resolution for Print & Web

curriculum.title: Module 2: Adobe Photoshop
lectures: Working with Layers, Masks & Adjustment Layers

curriculum.title: Module 3: Adobe Illustrator
lectures: Drawing Shapes & Using the Pen Tool
Working with Paths, Anchor Points & Curves

curriculum.title: Module 6: Design Projects & Portfolio Development
lectures: Choose a brand or product to design full collateral: logo, social media graphics, print flyer, brochure, landing page.
Prepare a final digital portfolio showcasing all work.

faqs.q: Who can join this Graphic Design Course?
faqs.a: Anyone! This course is perfect for beginners, students, freelancers, or anyone looking to learn professional graphic design skills from scratch — no prior experience needed.

faqs.q: What tools will I learn in this course?
faqs.a: You will master Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, and Figma — these are industry-standard tools used by professional designers worldwide for editing photos, creating vector graphics, layouts, and UI designs.

faqs.q: How are the classes conducted and what if I miss one?
faqs.a: Classes are hybrid (online + in-person) and fixed at 2 hours per session. Don’t worry if you miss a class — recordings are provided, so you can revise anytime.

faqs.q: Is there a certificate and any job opportunity after completing the course?
faqs.a: Yes! After completing the course and final project, you will receive an Oplyx Certificate of Completion. Plus, top students get a chance for an internship opportunity to gain real-world experience.
